title.en: A Supplication to Realize the Profound

text.en: You cause a pleasant rain of accomplishment and blessings to fall
text.en-trans: chöying kha la tukjé trin trik shing

text.en: From the clouds of compassion gathered in the sky-like dharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: jinlab ngödrub drang char beb dzepa

text.en: I supplicate you from the very depths of my heart.
text.en-trans: miché nying né güpé solwa deb

text.en: As the successor of all the vidyādharas and siddhas,
text.en-trans: rigdzin drubpa yong kyi dungtsob tu

text.en: You are a bodhisattva who has perfected the wisdom
Of the clear light heart-essence of Samantabhadra;
Glorious Guru, please bless me to realize this myself!
text.en-trans: palden lamé dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: My mind has never been born — this is the nature of awareness.
To settle in this experience without the slightest alteration or contrivance is meditation;
And conduct is to be without effort or concern for what to do or to avoid —
text.en-trans: panglang dzin tsol dralwé chöpa yi

text.en: Through this, may I actualize the primordially pure dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: kadak chöku ngön du gyurwar shok
